data.text: PLAY CALL BREAK GAME TO WIN CASH!
Show Your Call Break Tricks on vpl Now!

PLAY CALL BREAK GAME
TO WIN CASH!
Show Your Call Break Tricks on vpl Now!
Play over 60+ Games and Win Cash!

description: Card games have always been popular in India for ages. The Call Break card game is popularly played in India, Nepal, and other Asian countries. The game is known by different names such as Spades, Call Bridge, Lakdi, Call Break Taas, and Racing. The versions have slight changes in the rules depending on the places, but the core gameplay remains similar.  The Call Break game is one of the easiest online card games that you can play with friends and random opponents.
Here's everything you should know to start playing the Call Break multiplayer game.
Call break is an online card game. The most popular game in 2020 is now on vpl. It is a strategic card game similar to Spades. It is popular in Nepal and India.

Call Break Online is a trick-taking card game that is played using a standard deck of 52 cards. It is a strategic game that is similar to the Spades game. Each game consists of 5 rounds and is played in a multiplayer mode between 4 players.
Call Break rules are easy to learn and understand. Follow these rules to play the card game on vpl:

content: The Spade card is considered as the default trump in the card game.
The dealer distributes 13 cards to each player at the start.
Each player is required to call/bid the possible winnable tricks/hands with a minimum of 2 per player.
If a player doesn't receive at least one Spade card, the cards are shuffled and redistributed.
Each player must play a card of the same suit following the first player.
If the players don't have a card of the same suit, they can choose to play any other card including a trump card.
The rank of the cards in the highest to lowest order is Ace, King, Queen, Jack, 10, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2.

description: The call break card game starts with the dealer dealing 13 cards to each player. After receiving the cards, each player has to bid/call the number of hands expected to win in that particular round. The player at the right of the dealer makes the first move and plays any card of choice. The other players follow by playing a card of the same suit in an anti-clockwise direction. If any players don't have a card of the same suit, they can play a trump card or a card of another suit.

The player with a high-value card of the same suit wins the trick unless a player plays a trump card. If any players play a trump card, then the higher-value trump card wins the trick. The round is covpleted when no one is left with any card after which the points are calculated for that round. The game continues for 5 rounds and the player with the highest score at the end of the round wins the game.
The objective of the game is to win either equal number of hands called at the start of the game, or more hands.

The scoring system is quite fundamental and points are calculated after every round. All the players make calls based on cards received and have to make an equivalent number or more hands in the round.

content: Each player that wins an equal number of hands as bid in the beginning of the game, scores an equal number of points.
If you win more hands than the number bid, your score increases by 0.1 points for the extra hands won.
If you win fewer hands than the number bid, your score is deducted by points equal to the number of hands bid at the beginning.
If you call 8 or more hands, you will win 13 points if they win 8 or more hands. However, if the players can't win 8 or more hands, the players will lose 8 points.

data.header: How to Download vpl Call break App?

description: Call Break game download is available through the vpl app on the Google Play Store and App Store. For callbreak game download, follow the below steps on your mobile phone:

content: Visit the vpl website.
Enter your mobile number to receive the download link via SMS.
Click on the link and download the vpl app.
Find the call break game and tap on install for call break download.

data.header: How to Play Call Break Online?

description: After downloading the call break game, choose a cash contest you prefer to play and ensure you have a stable internet connection. When you submit the entry fee you will be matched with 3 other opponents after which the game will begin. Follow the below steps to play the game and win the cash prize:

content: Quickly look at your 13 cards dealt by the dealer and make your bid based on the hands you can win.
Play the cards of the same suit if you have them.
Use the Aces, Kings, and trump cards wisely to win multiple hands.
Try to win at least an equivalent number of hands as you bid at the beginning to avoid losing points.
Follow the rules and tips to increase your score.

data.header: Tips to Play Online Call Break on vpl

description: Winning cash prizes in these multiplayer card games is a piece of cake if you use these tips:

content: Before making a call, analyze your card carefully and identify the hands you can win easily. Make your bids based on the cards that will definitely help you win.
Try to memories the discarded cards to make the most of your trump cards and high-value cards.
Don't wait to use your high-value cards later in the game. Secure the easy hands earlier to avoid losing a high-value card to a trump card.
If you have low-value trump cards, don't count on them to win hands. You can use them for winning extra hands instead.
Try to get rid of the suit if you have only 1 or 2 cards from a particular suit. You can then use the trump cards to win if a player plays any card from the suit you don't have.

content.name: How can you play online Call Break with friends?
description: You can play the call break real money game with friends on the vpl app. Just download the app and follow the steps to play the game. Invite your friends to join the cash contest and score higher points to beat them.

content.name: How do you win a Call Break?
description: The key to winning the game is to score the maximum points in all five rounds. The trick is to predict correctly how many tricks you can win in a round and then ensure you win an equal number of tricks if not more to avoid getting your points deducted. You can also use the tips mentioned above to improve your game.
